name: ZapGhost
description:
Slide your fingertips to produce an electric light that destroys the ghost.

Basic rules:
       1. Eliminate all ghosts in order of number
       2. Need to destroy all ghosts with the same number at the same time
       3. Protect people from being hit by ghosts

"Slide your finger, cut the 'light', and eliminate the 'ghost'"

"Let 'light' pass through the 'ghost' and then cut 'light' to destroy it"

'At the same time destroy all ‘ghost’’ with the same number,

'When you eliminate the 'ghost', be careful to avoid ‘people’ and don’t accidentally hurt’.

'Destroy ‘ghost’ in order from small to large (the number on the 'light emitter’ indicates the number of available cuts)',

'Remember that the ‘ghost’ with the same number is to be eliminated at the same time? First eliminate the number 1, then the number 2',

'Now it’s up to you,have a problem, you can try the previous level again',

''Stone' blocks the light, and the flashing aperture indicates that it can be dragged',

'Don’t let the ‘ghost’ meet the ‘people’’,

'‘Bomb’ can destroy everything drag to the right place, cut ‘light’ and detonate it’,

'‘Battery’ can charge 'light emitter’,’

'Things covered by 'invisible devices' seem to have never existed.'
